title: New: Balam Acab – Oh, Why
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/balamacabfront.jpg "balamacabfront")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8436-new-balam-acab-oh-why/attachment/balamacabfront/)

In 2010 **Balam Acab** released his debut EP, See birds. He literally came out of nowhere and cemented the producer as a firm ‘one to watch’ of the year of 2011. The first release from his full-length debut, _Wander / Wonder_, is an emotionally confusing and sonically stimulating piece of music. It has a rather off-kilter ability to comfort through the slow and thoughtful tones of a female singer, while terrifying through the screeches and howls of a child. An introducing introduction to the album. _Wander / Wonder_ will be released on August 29.

 [BALAM ACAB – Oh, Why](http://soundcloud.com/tri_angle_records/balam-acab-oh-why) by [TriAngleRecords](http://soundcloud.com/tri_angle_records)
